snippet.title: DRAKE RPG Demo Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist now - https://steam.drake-game.com

Drake is a narrative driven Action RPG. Build your character. Meet factions controlling the distant desert planet called DRAKE. Face alien fauna. Uncover the mystery hidden under the surface. Explore this harsh Space Western World.

Our main goal is to tell an exciting story about the future world, where humanity has reached outside the Solar system, but remained itself — greedy for resources and power, each individual pursuing their own interests.

We've chosen cRPG narrative mechanics (Fallout, Divinity), mixed them with dynamic Top-Down shooter playstyle (Ruiner, Helldivers) and placed all of this into Space Western setting (Firefly, Mandalorian) full of references to our favorite Sci-Fi worlds.

Join our community and follow the development:
https://discord.com/invite/EbBurAkFb3
https://twitter.com/drakethegame
https://www.facebook.com/Drake.SteamGame
https://www.instagram.com/drake.game/
